open.title: Octotel Outage | Plett, Knysna, and Sedgefield
open.description: Octotel has informed us of a network outage affecting Plett, Knysna, and Sedgefield, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Octotel engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.

updates.content: Delft will be put on hold due to hostility with local gangs. No maintenance and installations will take place. Contractors are not able to enter the area.

open.title: Evotel| Welkom and Rustenburg
open.description: Evotel has informed us of degraded services affecting Welkom and Rustenburg. Affected clients will experience Slow speed during peak time.  Evotel engineers have identified the issue they are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

closed.title: Outage | International Connectivity
closed.description: We are investigating reports of high latency and packetloss to international networks. Our upstream provider is investigating the outage. We apologise for the inconvenience caused.
